channel.title: VitalizePK | 317 | vBulletin Forums | Webclient | 24-7 |
channel.description:
[font=verdana][CENTER][B]Links -[/B] [url=http://vitalizepk.com/forums/]Forums[/url] [url=http://vitalizepk.com/webclient/]Webclient[/url] [url=http://vitalizepk.com/desktop-client]Desktop Client[/url]
[SIZE=1]Hello and welcome to VitalizePK 0.3 advertisement page, Let me tell you a bit about the server and why you should join?
Sick of seeing the same old InsidiaX? Sick of seeing servers that are run by morons? Sick of seeing servers lasting only a month? If so this is the server for you! Vitalize has been in three beta stages to make sure that everything is in tip top condition ready to be released to the public with non to minimum problems. I, Envy program and run the server myself, why? Simply to ensure player safety, too many times have I seen servers that is team developed go wrong because a developer leaks the source. I understand that not many people enjoy training on a private server, that's why our experience rates are fairly high. A good economy is important but with that comes disappointment from those who want the easy path. We've combined both easy and difficult to produce a sensible way to earn the 'good' items and that's where our points system comes in. Vitalize points can be spent on items such as Torso, Void, Fury etc. Recently Bunny Ears have been added to the store as I wish to slowly introduce rares to the economy.
Content you can expect;
[B]--- Server ---[/B] > Flawless switching > Clipped following > Re-written skills > Enchanted combat > Custom areas i.e. Training dungeon > Various mini-games.
[B]--- Client ---[/B] > Clean client > Fast download > Low data usage > Toggle features > 525 Objects > 614 Hit marks > 614 Characters.
[B]--- Website ---[/B] > Registered domain > Paid web hosting (DDOS protected) > Paid vBulletin > Paid forum themes > Great facilities > Easy to navigate > Friendly community & staff.
The list is truly endless!
Media;
Our recently added monster the Corporeal Beast. [IMG]http://i.imgur.com/xRRBvGd.png[/img]
Fight caves rewritten, only a few waves long. [IMG]http://i.imgur.com/fBrKNjD.png[/img]
ALL our skills have been rewritten to ensure perfection. [IMG]http://i.imgur.com/XNoTh6O.png[/img]
Sick of seeing the same old Rock crab as beginner training? So are we that's why our new training dungeon is available with various starter NPCs to kill. [IMG]http://i.imgur.com/xnSl1IK.png[/img]
Pking is important to us as we did use to be a PK server, clan events are organised when possible to get the server together! [IMG]http://i.imgur.com/hvJK7CK.png[/img]
More training locations to visit, use Yak hides for crafting! [IMG]http://i.imgur.com/etoZNPo.png[/img]
Come check the server out today![/font] [/SIZE][/CENTER]

item.dc:creator: @Xx_Weed_Xx Xx Weed Xx
item.description:
@Xx_Weed_Xx wrote:

Soulcist:

You are doing a lot of these projects mate (also been a while since we’ve talked unfortunately), what are your plans for this (sorry if it’s in the text in OP, I skimmed pictures)?

I’ve only worked on vitalize to be honest, other projects have been more side projects to keep me entertained:p Indeed it has been a while since we’ve spoken, add me on Skype if you’ve got it. This is an advertisement btw.

Read full topic

Sick of seeing the same old InsidiaX? Sick of seeing servers that are run by morons? Sick of seeing servers lasting only a month? If so this is the server for you!
